00019 =head3   sourceButton
00020 
00021 ########################
00022 # activating the source button
00023 ########################
00024 
00025 # In order for this button to work the course needs to have a link from 
00026 
00027 #   myCourse/html/show-source.cgi   back to webwork2/htdocs/show-source.cgi
00028 
00029 #   in the directory myCourse/html
00030 #   execute the following command (you will need command line access to the server to do this)
00031 #   ln -s /opt/webwork/webwork2/htdocs/show-source.cgi    show-source.cgi
00032 #    
00033 #   You need to make sure that the file webwork2/htdocs/show-source.cgi is executable by the 
00034 #   apache webserver.  
00035 #
00036 #   To accomplish this you need to uncomment this line in webwork.apache2-config
00037 #
00038 #   ScriptAliasMatch /webwork2_course_files/([^/]*)/show-source.cgi/(.*) /opt/webwork/courses/$1/html/show-source.cgi/$2
00039 #
00040 #
00041 #   The show-source.cgi script may also have to be customized to set $root to the webwork2 directory
00042 
00043 
00044 
00045 =cut
00046 
00047 1;
